title: Avoid Unnecessary Adverbs
explanation: Remove weak adverbs like 'easily', 'simply', 'basically', 'manually', 'automatically', 'actually', 'really' that add no value.
why: Adverbs often weaken writing and make instructions seem uncertain. Direct language is clearer.

bad: You can easily configure the settings

solution: Remove unnecessary adverbs (like 'easily', 'simply', 'basically', 'manually', 'automatically') to make writing more direct and confident.

title: Avoid Weak Modal Verbs
explanation: Replace 'can', 'may', 'should', 'will' with direct imperative language in instructions.
why: Modal verbs create uncertainty in technical instructions. Users need clear, definitive guidance.

bad: You will be able to see

solution: Use direct language instead of modal verbs for clearer instructions.

title: Simplify UI Interaction Language
explanation: Use 'click' instead of 'click on', 'select' instead of 'select on'. Remove unnecessary prepositions.
why: Shorter, more direct language reduces cognitive load and sounds more natural.
solution: Simplify UI interaction language by removing unnecessary prepositions.

title: Fix Inconsistent Capitalization
explanation: Avoid ALL CAPS for emphasis. Use sentence case for UI elements unless they appear in ALL CAPS in the interface.
why: ALL CAPS appears like shouting and reduces readability. Consistent capitalization improves professionalism.
solution: Use consistent capitalization following sentence case rules.

title: Eliminate Hedging Language
explanation: Remove uncertain language like 'might', 'perhaps', 'possibly', 'maybe', 'kind of', 'sort of'.
why: Technical documentation needs to be definitive and confident. Hedging creates doubt.
solution: Replace hedging language with definitive, confident statements.

title: Remove Filler Words
why: Filler words add no meaning and make writing verbose. Every word should add value.
solution: Remove filler words that add no meaning to make writing more concise.

title: Eliminate Redundant Phrases
explanation: Remove phrases like 'in order to' (use 'to'), 'due to the fact that' (use 'because'), 'at this point in time' (use 'now').
why: Concise writing is clearer and faster to read. Redundant phrases waste the reader's time.

bad: In order to save the file
Due to the fact that it's broken

solution: Replace redundant phrases with concise alternatives.

title: Use Direct Address
explanation: Use 'you' instead of 'the user', 'one', 'users', or 'people' in instructions.
why: Direct address makes instructions more personal and engaging. It's clearer who should act.
solution: Use direct address ('you') instead of third-person references.

title: Simplify Technical Jargon
explanation: Replace complex technical terms with simpler alternatives when possible, or explain them on first use.
why: Accessible language serves a broader audience and reduces cognitive load.
solution: Replace complex jargon with simpler, more accessible language.

title: Maintain Parallel Structure
explanation: Keep consistent verb forms in lists and sequences. All items should follow the same grammatical pattern.
why: Parallel structure improves readability and flow. It makes lists easier to scan and understand.

bad: Save the file, editing content, and publication
good: Save the file, edit content, and publish
Configure settings, test connections, and deploy

solution: Maintain parallel structure in lists by using consistent verb forms.

title: Simplify Prepositional Phrases
explanation: Remove unnecessary prepositions like 'of', 'on', 'for' when they don't add meaning.
why: Reduces wordiness and improves clarity. Simpler phrases are easier to parse.
solution: Simplify by removing unnecessary prepositions and prepositional phrases.

title: Write Helpful Error Messages
explanation: Error messages should explain what happened and what to do next. Avoid technical error codes without explanation.
why: Users need actionable guidance when things go wrong. Cryptic errors frustrate users.

good: Page not found. Check the URL and try again.
Upload failed. Check file size and try again.
Required field is empty. Please fill in all required information.

solution: Write error messages that explain the problem and provide clear next steps.
